metadata.title: CVE-2023-2007 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The specific flaw exists within the DPT I2O Controller driver. The issueresults from the lack of proper locking when performing operations on anobject. An attacker can leverage this in conjunction with othervulnerabilities to escalate privileges and execute arbitrary code in thecontext of the kernel.
